Package de.fhg.iml.vlog.xfvrp.opt.improve

Class Summary
XFVRP2Opt Standard 2-opt search by inverting the giant tour Implementation follows best ascent pattern by fully evaluating the n^2 neighborhood.
XFVRP2OptIntra Standard 2-opt search by inverting the giant tour Implementation follows best ascent pattern by fully evaluating the n^2 neighborhood.
XFVRP3CyclicTransfer Experimental procedure for a cyclic transfer with 3 nodes
XFVRP3Opt This neighborhood search means the 3-opt-edge exchange NS from literature.
XFVRP3PointMove  
XFVRPILS Optimization procedure for iterative local search Three local search procedures with adaptive randomized variable neighborhood selection.
XFVRPOptImpBase This class provides the basis local search structure of iterativly calling an improve-method and memorizing the best solution.
XFVRPOrOpt  
XFVRPOrOptWithInvert  
XFVRPPathExchange Path Exchange neighborhood search is a union of several neighborhoods - XFVRPRelocate - XFVRPSwap - XFVRPOrOpt2 - XFVRPSwapBody2 The neighborhoods are sequentially searched for the best improving step.
XFVRPRelocate Contains the optimization algorithms for 2-opt
XFVRPRelocate2  
XFVRPSwap The swap neighborhood search improves a solution by exchanging two nodes at their positions.
XFVRPSwapSegment This neighborhood search produces improved solutions by exchanging two segments of the giant tour.
XFVRPSwapSegmentEqual This neighborhood search produces improved solutions by exchanging two segments of the giant tour.
XFVRPSwapSegmentWithInvert This neighborhood search produces improved solutions by exchanging two segments of the giant tour.
